alert.note: Alert for Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:57AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Logan and southwestern Johnson Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 656 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alma to near Jenny Lind. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Booneville... Paris... Lamar... Magazine... Subiaco... Hartman... Scranton... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Hinkle... Hoyt... Spadra... Mount Magazine... Coal Hill... Caulksville... Morrison Bluff... Roseville... Chismville... Union City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
